targets.rawSql:
SELECT gs_count.host_name, total_gs hosted_growth_sessions, count total_number_of_attendees
FROM (
	SELECT u.name host_name, COUNT(growth_session_id) total_gs
	FROM growth_session_user gsu
	JOIN users u ON u.id = gsu.user_id
	JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
	WHERE gsu.user_type_id = 1 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	GROUP BY gsu.user_id
) gs_count
JOIN
(
	SELECT COUNT(user_id) count, u.name host_name
	FROM (
	SELECT user_id, gsu.growth_session_id, gs_owners.owner_id
		FROM growth_session_user gsu
		JOIN (
			SELECT gsu.growth_session_id gs_id, user_id owner_id
			FROM growth_session_user gsu
			WHERE gsu.user_type_id = 1
			) gs_owners 
			ON gs_owners.gs_id = gsu.growth_session_id
		JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
		WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	) data
	JOIN users u ON u.id = data.owner_id 
	GROUP BY owner_id
) user_count ON gs_count.host_name = user_count.host_name
ORDER BY total_gs DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
  MAX(attendee_count.count)
FROM
(
  SELECT count(user_id) as count
  FROM growth_session_user gsu
  JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
  WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
  GROUP BY growth_session_id
) as attendee_count

SELECT u1.name user_1, COUNT(data.user_id1) times_mobbed_together, u2.name user_2
FROM (
  SELECT gsu1.user_id as user_id1, 
  		gsu2.user_id as user_id2 
  FROM (
  	SELECT *
  	FROM growth_session_user gsu
  	JOIN users u ON u.id = gsu.user_id
  	WHERE u.is_vehikl_member = 1 
  ) gsu1
  JOIN (
  	SELECT *
  	FROM growth_session_user gsu
  	JOIN users u ON u.id = gsu.user_id
  	WHERE u.is_vehikl_member = 1 
  ) gsu2
  ON gsu1.growth_session_id = gsu2.growth_session_id AND gsu1.user_id <> gsu2.user_id
	JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu1.growth_session_id
	WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	) data
JOIN users u1 ON u1.id = data.user_id1
JOIN users u2 ON u2.id = data.user_id2
GROUP BY data.user_id1, data.user_id2
ORDER BY times_mobbed_together DESC;

SELECT AVG(attendee_count.count)
FROM
(
  SELECT COUNT(user_id) count
  FROM growth_session_user gsu
  JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
  WHERE gsu.user_type_id = 2 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
  GROUP BY growth_session_id
) attendee_count;

SELECT MAX(growth_sessions_count.count)
FROM
(
  SELECT COUNT(id) count
  FROM growth_sessions gs
  WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
  GROUP BY gs.date
) growth_sessions_count;

SELECT AVG(growth_sessions_count.count)
FROM
(
  SELECT COUNT(id) count
  FROM growth_sessions gs
  WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
  GROUP BY gs.date
) growth_sessions_count;

SELECT count(gsu.growth_session_id) guest_attendee_count 
FROM growth_session_user gsu
JOIN users u ON gsu.user_id = u.id
JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gsu.growth_session_id = gs.id
WHERE gsu.user_type_id = 2 AND gs.is_public = 1 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to' AND u.is_vehikl_member = 0
GROUP BY gsu.growth_session_id
ORDER BY guest_attendee_count DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT github_nickname)
FROM users u
JOIN growth_session_user gsu ON u.id = gsu.user_id
JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'

SELECT time, COUNT(growth_session_id) total_gs, SUM(user_count) total_attendees
FROM (
	SELECT growth_session_id, COUNT(user_id) user_count, CAST(date as datetime) time
	FROM growth_session_user gsu
	JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
  WHERE gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	GROUP BY growth_session_id
) data
GROUP BY time;

SELECT u.name, COUNT(growth_session_id) total_gs 
FROM growth_session_user gsu
JOIN users u ON u.id = gsu.user_id
JOIN growth_sessions gs ON gs.id = gsu.growth_session_id
WHERE gsu.user_type_id = 2 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
GROUP BY gsu.user_id
ORDER BY total_gs DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT SUM(count) gs_with_limit
FROM (
	SELECT COUNT(id) count
	FROM growth_sessions gs
	WHERE attendee_limit < 1000 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	GROUP BY attendee_limit
) data;

SELECT SUM(count) gs_with_no_limit
FROM (
	SELECT COUNT(id) count
	FROM growth_sessions gs
	WHERE attendee_limit > 1000 AND gs.date BETWEEN '$from' AND '$to'
	GROUP BY attendee_limit
) data;
